entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 19.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 16.0°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 18 except 10 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 18 except 10 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
